report.title: Occurrences Download 2
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the explore report parameters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences co JOIN occurrences o on o.id=co.id AND o.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN locations l on l.id=ils.location_id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id AND ctt.term='Vice County' ) on ils.sample_id=co.sample_id JOIN websites w on w.id=co.website_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')) AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(co.public_geom, st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913))) AND (#ownData#=0 OR CAST(co.created_by_id AS character varying)='#currentUser#') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' or '#date_from#'='Click here' or co.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' or '#date_to#'='Click here' or co.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND quality_check('#quality#', o.record_status, co.certainty)=true #idlist#

param.name: date_from
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date

param.name: date_to
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter tco.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN locations lfilter ON st_intersects(lfilter.boundary_geom, co.public_geom) AND lfilter.id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: ownGroups
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tgfilter ON tgfilter.id=co.taxon_group_id AND tgfilter.id IN (#taxon_groups#)

param.name: surveys
param.description: List of survey IDs to view data for

param.name: ownSurveys
param.join: JOIN surveys su ON su.id=co.survey_id AND su.id IN (#surveys#)

column.name: entered_sref
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then co.public_entered_sref else replace(co.public_entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(s.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else case length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')) when 5 then 2000 else pow(10, (12-length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')))/2) end end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN w.id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE w.title || '->' END || co.recorders

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Input still in progress' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Record Submitted' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE o.record_status END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(co.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: certainty
column.sql: CASE co.certainty WHEN 'C' THEN 'Certain' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Likely' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Uncertain' END

column.name: strokecolor
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'C' then case co.certainty when 'C' then 'green' when 'L' then 'orange' when 'U' then 'red' else 'blue' end when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'black' end

column.name: fillcolor
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'blue' end
